titleStmt.title: The Bishop of Exons Caution to his diocese against false doctrines delivered in a sermon at Truro in Cornwall at his primary visitation.
titleStmt.author: Sparrow, Anthony, 1612-1685.

notesStmt.note: "Published in 1676 as pt. 2 of A rationale upon the Book of Common Prayer"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
